title: Russia hit with new round of U.S. sanctions as Biden decries 'major war crimes'
content:
1. Russia hit with new round of U.S. sanctions as Biden decries 'major war crimes'  Reuters.com
  2. Putin's daughters: Hear how they could be targeted with sanctions  CNN

  5. White House: US, allies to ban new investments in Russia  Yahoo News

localize.title: バイデンが「重大な戦争犯罪」を非難し、ロシアに新たな米国制裁が下される。
